ResourceHeader.ResourceName: IMP-8 Electrostatic Energy-Charge Analyzer, EECA, 12-day Flux Plots

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Updated one AccessURL URL by JMW 2022-06-02, revised NumericalData ResourceID, added Prior ID, expanded the ResourceName, ResourceHeader Description, and AccessURL Name text fields, added Cadence and DisplayCadence text values, metadata updated to SPASE 2.4.1, reviewed by LFB 20220724

Added MetadataRightsList. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Updated to 2.7.1. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: 12-day plots of IMP-8 Electrostatic Energy-Charge Analyzer, EECA, energetic particle fluxes with data the P3, P5, P7 and A2 detectors. Each plot covers one orbit, and each is color-coded to show the nominal positions of the bow shock and the magnetopause. Data from EECA at selected rates are are also available. The access portal is hosted by the University of Maryland and some text from the portal web page has been paraphrased here.

AccessURL.Name: IMP-8 Electrostatic Energy-Charge Analyzer, EECA, University of Maryland access portal
